us.phonetic: /v. rɪˈkɔrd; n., adj. ˈrɛkɚd/, (v. ri kôrd′; n., adj. rek′ərd)

example.eg: The captain left a record in his log.  The company keeps a record of all its transactions.
example.egtrans: 船长在日志中留下一份记录。这家公司对所有往来都有记载。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 记录，记载, 案卷，档案

example.eg: The record shows that the war was destructive.
example.egtrans: 历史记录显示那场战争破坏了许多东西。

example.eg: This politician has a record of voting against her party.
example.egtrans: 这名政客有过投票反对自己政党的过往行为。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 过往成就，过往, 往事

example.eg: Our team holds the record for total points scored.
example.egtrans: 我们队保持着总得分的最高记录。

example.eg: The band recorded a new album.
example.egtrans: 该乐队录制了一张新专辑。

us.phonetic: /v. rɪˈkɔrd; n., adj. ˈrɛkɚd/, (v. ri kôrd′; n., adj. rek′ərd)

example.eg: The temperature reached record highs.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 创纪录的, 超过历史记录的

example.eg: Nomadic tribes leave few records.
example.egtrans: 游牧民族留下的相关文字记载少之又少。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 文字记载, 书面记录

example.eg: This book is a record of their achievements.
example.egtrans: 这本书就是他们成就的一份记录。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 功过记录, 成绩记录, 成绩记录

example.eg: The prosecutor entered evidence into the record.
example.egtrans: 检察官将证据写入司法报告。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 司法报告, 庭审档案

example.eg: The judicial record demonstrates the precedent.
example.egtrans: 案宗中记载了前科情况。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 犯罪前科记录, 案宗, 案卷

example.eg: I bought a new record.
The database table has 130 records in it.
example.egtrans: 这份数据表内载有130条数据。

example.eg: We're ready to record.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 录音, 录影, 录像

example.eg: I'll record that idea for future reference.
These ruins record the life of the Vikings in England.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 提供关于...的证据, 记录下, 显示出

example.eg: The videotape recorded a disturbance.

us.phonetic: /v. rɪˈkɔrd; n., adj. ˈrɛkɚd/, (v. ri kôrd′; n., adj. rek′ərd)

example.eg: We broke a record today; it's the first March ever with absolutely no snow here.
Suspicion fell on him because he had a criminal record.
For the record, it wasn't me who left the back door open when we went out.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 以供备案, 记录在案

example.eg: We made the journey in record time.
I don't think you can find long play records any more.
El País is often considered to be a newspaper of record from Spain.
A copy will be sent to the parties of record on the case.
The senator  apologized for his off-the-record remarks.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 非官方的, 不公开的

example.eg: Those comments were made off the record and weren't intended for publication.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 非正式地, 不公开地

example.eg: This was the hottest summer on record.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 有记载地, 记录在案地

example.eg: The Mayor went on record, detailing his new municipal plan.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 公开发表地, 公开声明地

example.eg: The politician's comments were on the record and were published in several newspapers.

dsense.name: public record
dsense.guideword: often plural (document open to the public)

trans_examp.trans_cn: 公共记录, 公开文件

example.eg: Have you written it down in the record book?
The athlete became a record breaker when she won her fifth gold medal at the Olympic Games.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 打破纪录者, 创造纪录的人

example.eg: He was the world record holder for the long jump for five consecutive years.
Accurate record keeping is of crucial importance.
I use my record player all the time because I think music sounds better on vinyl!
I don't think I'll ever fulfil my ambition of being a record producer.
He is a record-company executive.
If you don't think he can do the job, you can always check his service record at the employment office.
The sergeant had a great service record and had won many medals.
When they repaired the car's engine they made an entry on the service record.
Johnson set a record in the long jump this afternoon.

dsense.name: set the record straight, put the record straight

trans_examp.trans_cn: 澄清问题, 纠正错误

example.eg: The Guinness World Book tracks the speed records of cars, airplanes, boats, etc.

dsense.name: track record
dsense.guideword: figurative, informal (previous performance) (比喻，非正式用语)

example.eg: This employee has a great track record of finishing work on time.
example.egtrans: 这名员工有良好的按时完工的业务记录。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 以前的成绩记录，业绩，业务记录，工作成绩记录

example.eg: To win the race she'll have to beat the current world-record holder.
